name: Streusen
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn DON!!-1, then rest this Character: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed cost is the same as the declared cost, rest up to one of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed cost is the same as the declared cost, rest up to one of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
